Module wargames
Package edu.ntnu.idatt2001.runarin.frontend.controllers

Class WarGamesController

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.idatt2001.runarin.frontend.controllers.WarGamesController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class WarGamesController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
MVC Controller class for communication between the application view and the model holding data.
Since:
2022-05-18
Version:
4.0
Author:
Runar Indahl

    • initArmy

      private void initArmy(String armyFilePath, javafx.scene.text.Text textFieldArmyName, ArmyWrapper armyWrapper)
      Method that initializes an army from a file.
      Parameters:
      armyFilePath - file path to the army, using the data of army name and its units.
      textFieldArmyName - the text to be updated in the view.
      armyWrapper - the wrapper containing the army to be initialized.

    • initViewData

      private void initViewData()
      Method for initializing view data. These data regards file paths, what buttons to be initially disabled, button color, and terrain enum.
      See Also:
      • Initializable

    • initTextStrokes

      private void initTextStrokes()
      Method for setting CSS data regarding subtitle strokes, thickness and fill. NOTE: When initialized, the application runs slower than what should be expected.
      See Also:
      • Initializable

    • setTextStrokeAndFill

      private void setTextStrokeAndFill(javafx.scene.text.Text text, Double strokeWidth)
      Helper method to initTextStrokes() for minimizing code.

    • initTooltips

      private void initTooltips()
      Method sets tooltips to give additional information to a user, when hovering buttons.
      See Also:
      • Initializable

    • initBindings

      private void initBindings()
      Method links static Controller data with View data.
      See Also:
      • Initializable
      • ArmyWrapper

    • initListeners

      private void initListeners()
      Method initializes listeners to watch over an army's units list. Whenever a list is updated these listeners will update the ListView content in the application view. ArmyWrapper class contains fields with an observable datatype that can be updated by these lambda methods.
      See Also:
      • Initializable
      • ArmyWrapper

    • buttonStylesUpdate

      public void buttonStylesUpdate()
      Method updates the view style for buttons that are relevant for adding units to an army.
